Text: NAM Fortune Survey Third QuarterNAM member Your company has been selected to participate in the quarterly NAMFORTUNE Manufacturing Index online survey The NAMFortune Manufacturing Index has appeared in FORTUNEs Industrial Management and Technology edition since Below is a link to the online survey covering the third quarter of Four times a year your companys response will be tallied with other NAM members and published in FORTUNEs Industrial Management and Technology edition Completing the survey is as easy as Click on the link below Fill out the short survey and Click the submit button at the end of the survey ECOFortuneforlghtm ECOFortuneforlghtm Please fill out this survey by September th In addition to being featured quarterly in FORTUNE Magazine you can look at previous survey results on NAMs internet homepage at ECOFortuneindexhtml ECOFortuneindexhtml Thank you in advance for helping us at the NAM better serve your interests If you have any questions please contact Dave Huether at mailto Unable to click on the links Sometimes links are broken when they are transmitted via email or if your email program does not support hyperlinks When this happens we suggest you copy and paste the URL into your browser This way you can get the whole link as sometimes it carries over onto the next line When you do this make sure there are no spaces in the link
